ygData.subject: RE: Rarity of lambent stones
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that only Griffons drop the stones - not Griffins (or is it the other way around?).  I ve gleened Lambent stones in Oasis, Rathe Mnts, and North Karana
ygData.messageBody:
I think that only Griffons drop the stones - not Griffins (or is it the
other way around?). I've gleened Lambent stones in Oasis, Rathe Mnts, and
North Karana - so I know you can definitely get them there.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 1:50 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Rarity of lambent stones
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> I'm finding it easier to get the armor quest components
> versus getting a
> lambent stones. So far I have five quest components. I have been
> auctioning to buy a lambent stone ever since the patch came
> out. I have
> tried this in every zone I pass through. Not once has anyone
> had one to
> sell. I've asked my guild to be on the lookout for them.
> Despite killing
> numerous giants, no one in my guild has looted one. Do
> lambent stones only
> get dropped in specific zones or can they get dropped in any
> zone with a
> giant or griffin? How often do they get dropped?
>
> Also, can non-bards complete the bard armor quests in order
> to sell the
> lambent armor pieces? If the armor is NO DROP, I guess its
> possible that
> people are hanging on to lambent stones so they can complete
> the quests. I
> know most of the quest components are NO DROP but I can't
> remember if the
> lambent armor is NO DROP so can someone confirm this for me?
>
> Thanks
> Galtin of E'ci
